Title: Establishes certain persons who have previously provided a DNA sample shall not be required to pay a DNA databank fee for his or her conviction for certain offenses
Summary: Establishes that no person who has previously provided a DNA sample shall be required to pay a DNA databank fee for his or her conviction for a subsequent designated offense unless such sample has been expunged.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing certain persons shall not be required to pay a DNA databank fee for the conviction of a subsequent designated offense
